thread.title: Erin Energy Announces Release Date and Conference Call Information for Year-End 2017 Results

author: cnbc.com
title: Erin Energy Announces Release Date and Conference Call Information for Year-End 2017 Results

organizations.name: erin energy corporation erin energy corporation

text:
HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Erin Energy Corporation (Erin Energy or the Company) (NYSE American:ERN) (JSE:ERN) has scheduled release of its 2017 fourth-quarterly results and filing of its 2017 annual report on Form 10-K to occur after close of market on Thursday, March 15, 2018. The Company will host a conference call on Friday, March 16, 2018 at 10:00 a.m. CT (11:00 a.m. ET) to discuss the results and update its current operations.
The dial-in number to access the conference call is 1-844-883-3907 in the United States or 1-412-317-9253 internationally. Participants should ask the call operator to be placed on the “Erin Energy Results Conference Call.”
To access the live audio webcast, please visit the “Investors” section of the Company’s website at www.erinenergy.com.
Erin Energy Corporation Erin Energy Corporation is an independent oil and gas exploration and production company focused on energy resources in sub-Saharan Africa. Its asset portfolio consists of 5 licenses across 3 countries covering an area of 6,100 square kilometers (~1.5 million acres), including current production and other exploration projects offshore Nigeria, as well as exploration licenses offshore Ghana and The Gambia. Erin Energy is headquartered in Houston, Texas, and is listed on the New York and Johannesburg Stock Exchanges under the ticker symbol ERN.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180307005592/en/
Erin Energy Corporation
